name: Crumple-Episode 1
description:
Crumple is an episodic, 2D Puzzle Platformer where you must save Enve, an envelope which wakes up inside a large paper factory which is slowly burning to the ground!

Guide Enve through this factory using jumps, slides & , yes, CRUMPLING as you help Enve discover the cause of the fire, how it ended up in there to begin with & why!

This is our very 1st game release under the Nascent Games portfolio and your support means we will be able to finish the remaining 2 or 3 episodes!

Thank you for supporting Indie!

Game Controls (Basic)

Option 1 – Keyboard Movement: W, A, S, D Jump: Space Bar Pause: P

Option 2 – Controller (X360 most recommended, Wired PS4 controller may work also!) Movement: Digital or Analog stick Jump: A (X360), X (PS4) Pause: Start

For the more advanced game controls, please be sure to play through Crumple and look for various Black Directional signs against some platforms or walls to let you know you can actively perform its respective move.

ENJOY!
